options.name: Zealots Gift
options.description: Gain 2 Beginner and 1 Novice Spell from any Traditional or Exoctic Spell School and gain +2 Power Regeneration.

options.name: Free Action : Reward the Faithful
options.description: When you get a True hit on any Attack on a Creature that is at most 2 Levels lower than you, gain Temporary Health equal to your Level that lasts until expended or the end of a Full Rest.

options.name: Armor of Faith
options.description: Gain +2 Divine Mitigation and +2 Dark Mitigation

options.name: Guided Hand
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Damage and +1 Damage to Melee Attacks

options.name: Reaction : Enduring Faith
options.description: Whenever you are forced to make either a Concentration, Resilience or Resistance Check, add an additional 1d6 to the total. This ability can be used after the result of the roll is known.
